item.title: Host memory accounting
item.description: Memory is used for many things: the hypervisor code: this is the Xen executable itself the hypervisor heap: this is needed for per-domain structures and per-vCPU structures the crash kernel: this is needed to collect information after a host crash domain RAM: this is the memory the VM believes it has shadow memory: for HVM guests running on hosts without hardware assisted paging (HAP) Xen uses shadow to optimise page table updates.
